summary: The speaker discusses their recent experience getting their hair styled by their aunt, who created Alicia Keys-inspired braids. The speaker expresses dissatisfaction with the size of the braids, noting that they asked for them to be smaller but feels they turned out too small. They mention adding hair extensions to lengthen the braids. The speaker appears to be overthinking the situation, expressing anxiety and seeking reassurance from others about how the hairstyle looks.
keywords: hair, braids, Alicia Keys, hairstyle, overreacting, anxiety, extensions, aunt, city, cost, 350
creator_demographic: Age Range: Unknown, Gender: Female, Geographic Location: Unknown
